DOC.brief_title: Ozone Therapy Masticatory Muscle Pain ( OTMMP )

Any TMJ internal derangement Inflammatory connective tissue disease Psychiatric problem Tumour Hearth disease pacemaker Pregnancy Other orofacial region disease symptom ( e.g . toothache , neuralgia , migraine ) Treatment medication use headache bruxism last 2 year Local skin infection masseter temporal muscle
